attributes.action: Registering with a 2nd Doctor near to your work
attributes.additional_details: I believe it would prove to be both practical and beneficial to be allowed to register with two doctors surgeries. One close to home and one close to work. This would negate the need to take time off from work for visits which do not effect your attending work but which do necessitate a visit to your Doctor, minor ailments, tests , niggling injuries, etc.
